<h3 id="X31472">X(31472) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {INCIRCLE, 2nd LEMOINE, NINE-POINTS}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*S*a^2+(b+c)^2*(a-b+c)*(a+b-c)  :  :
